about_the_game:
Tired of the same old grind? Office Survivor throws you into the hilarious (and sometimes horrifying) world of corporate life. This 2D, casual roguelike adventure is a bullet hell unlike any other, where the climb to the top is riddled with office politics, nepotism, and flying staplers.

You are the newest intern. Armed with a fresh resume and a dream (of escaping the break room microwave), you'll navigate the treacherous waters of office life. Each floor presents a new challenge:

  • Dodge a barrage of emails, coffee mugs, and passive-aggressive memos.

  • Outwit your sycophantic coworkers and navigate the minefield of office gossip.

  • Master the art of brown-nosing to impress your superiors (or at least avoid getting stapled to the wall).

Are you ready to climb the corporate ladder? Because trust us, it's going to get messy.

Key Features:

  • Hilarious take on office life with a bullet hell twist.

  • Casual roguelike gameplay for quick, pick-up-and-play sessions.

  • Unique challenges on each floor, filled with office shenanigans.

  • Endless replayability with procedurally generated levels.

  • A world of quirky characters and bosses to outmaneuver.

Embrace the grind. Ascend the ranks. Survive the Office Odyssey!

name: Office Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060, Radeon RX 5600 XT, or Intel Arc A580

short_description: Office Survivor is a laugh-out-loud adventure that pokes fun at the absurdity of corporate culture. With its casual roguelike mechanics, every run is unique, offering endless replayability and a constantly evolving office landscape.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French
*languages with full audio support
